[b]Version 1.0:[/b] Release. [b]Version 1.1:[/b] Red Queen with Burn and Cleave added. [b]Version 1.2:[/b] Compatibility for Sheath Your Sword and Combat Extended.
[h1]Legendary Swords[/h1]
Grants access to a small collection of 5 swords made by legendary craftsmiths.
- Cloud Sword (Storm) - Nightfall (Poison) - Executioner (Frost) - Deathbringer (Bleed) - Red Queen (Flame)
Each weapon has 8 attacks with different moves, hidden mechanics and effects. You can mow down your foes with powerful stabs and mighty slashes, let them slowly suffer by poison or behead them with a single, but well aimed hit. An inspiration, insight or blessing by the gods is necessary to smith these weapons at the Ancestral Forge.
[h1]Requirements[/h1]
- Skill: 18 Crafting - Technology Level: Medieval - Research: Book of Wisdom (Prequisites: LongBlades + PlateArmor) - Ancestral Forge: (Prequisites: Passive Cooler + Smithing) - Inspiration: Creativity
[b]Compatibility and Loadorder[/b]
- JecsTools (Maneuver) - Combat Extended (CE) - Supreme Melee ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1841138974]Link[/url]) - Sheath Your Sword ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1586105873]Link[/url]) - Vanilla Weapons Expanded ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1814383360]Link[/url]) - Vanilla Factions Expanded: Medieval ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1854610483]Link[/url]) - Medieval Madness (([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1851407975]Link[/url]) - Cybernetic Warfare and Special Weapons ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1811369911]Link[/url]) - Swords [i]- load it here -[/i]
